#### PR description:

This PR fixes the race condition mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41786#issuecomment-1588092910 by adding a spinloop to protect the assignment of `StripDetset`.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to 13_1_X and 13_0_X.
title: Protect assignment of StripDetset() in StMeasurementDetSet::getDetSet()
